Articles.Content:
Did anyone play this game on Android or iOS:

http://play.mob.org/game/space_simulator.html

And, if yes, is it any good? Would be nice to have a new game on my phone I can toy arround with for hours :).
I know scot Manley posted a review of an earlier version of this game but other than that idk
I'm gonna try this game out, seems interesting.
It looks neat, I don't know how it can process and render all the things it says it is capable of doing on a phone processor, from gameplay and screenings, it looks like an orbiter port.
It looks good, but I like Space Agency (beware intentionally highly unrealistic orbit mechanics) and SimpleRockets with Grand Extension Interstellar for a pretty much KSP mobile port
